title: hud
description: Configures whether elements of the on-screen display (alternately known as the 'heads up display', or 'HUD') are visible on the screen.

fields.title: target
fields.description: Selector of the player(s) to toggle visibility for.

fields.title: visible
fields.description: State to change the HUD element visibility to.

fields.title: hud_element
fields.description: Specific HUD element to configure visibility for.

overloads.title: Configures HUD element visibility for a selection of players.
overloads.description: Configures HUD element visibility for a selection of players.
